UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Secretory ranalexin produced in recombinant Pichia pastoris exhibits additive or synergistic bactericidal activity when used in combination with polymyxin B or linezolid against multi-drug resistant bacteria.
Literature.Author: Aleinein RA, Schäfer H, Wink M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Sheep erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=62.5 µg/ml,Sheep erythrocytes:53% Hemolysis=250 µg/ml
